name: Infinite Asteroids
description:
All know the game Asteroids but Infinite Asteroids is the best game of this type.

Features:

  • Destroy hundreads of asteroids
  • Compare your highscore with other ones
  • A ranking system
  • The game gets more difficult with every 4 stages
  • Fancy graphics

Press SPACE or ENTER to shoot and the ARROWS or WASD to move.
